body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. Enable Bzlmod with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_build_error", version = "0.8.6")
```


## What's Changed
* Check incompatibility flags to prevent potential breaking changes by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/127

**Full Changelog (since the last published version)**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.8.4...0.8.6
(**Full Changelog (since the last unpublished version)**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.8.5...0.8.6)

This version was not published to the BCR because it failed the CI gate.

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): bump actions/create-github-app-token from 1 to 2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/108
* ubuntu 20.04 runner retirement by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/110
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 4.0.0 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/111
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 4.0.0 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/112
* Updated platforms to 1.0.0 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/113
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.2.0 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/114
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 4.0.1 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/115
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 4.0.1 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/116
* Updated rules_cc to 0.1.2 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/117
* Update tests.yml: update windows runner by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/118
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.8.0 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/119
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.8.0 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/120
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.8.1 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/121
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.8.1 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/122
* Updated rules_cc to 0.1.3 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/123
* Updated rules_cc to 0.1.4 by @bazel-steward-app[bot] in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/124
* Update release.yml:  Set `prerelease: false` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/125
* chore: add `config_settings` to remove deprecated dependency by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/126


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.8.4...0.8.5

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. Enable Bzlmod with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_build_error", version = "0.8.4")
```


## What's Changed
* update doc by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/100
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.0 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/102
* Updated platforms to 0.0.11 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/103
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/104
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 3.2.0 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/105
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 8.0.3, load C/C++ APIs from `rules_cc` by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/107


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.8.3...0.8.4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.8.2...0.8.3

## What's Changed
* Specify bazel 8.0.0rc4 in presubmit.yml by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/88

* use 8.* by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/90
* add `cc_build_error_test` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/91

## What's Changed
* Use cache by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/83
* Revert "Use cache (#83)" by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/84
* Use cache for non-scheduled jobs by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/85
* fix readme by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/86
* Support Bazel 8.0.0rc4 by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/87


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.6.1...0.7.0

## What's Changed
* fix: extension `.C` is C++ by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/77
* fix: refer to host OS by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/78
* fix: use shorter paths by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/79
* revert #78, use target platform by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/80
* add new CI runners by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/81
* fix the problem in windows caused by symlinks by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/82


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.6.0...0.6.1

## What's Changed
* chore: Use wildcard for bazel version by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/70
* Update bazel-steward.yml: Only specify the major version by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/71
* Update common.bash: restrict environment variables when running tests by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/72
* update readme by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/73
* update readme to refer to BCR by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/74
* change license to cc0 by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/75


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.5.4...0.5.5

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. Enable Bzlmod with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.

## What's Changed
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 3.1.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/60
* Updated hermetic_cc_toolchain to 3.1.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/59
* use `install-bazelisk` action by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/61
* Update .gitignore: erase unneeded item by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/62
* chore(deps): bump bazel-contrib/.github from 6 to 7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/63
* Update dependabot.yml: change to daily by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/64
* Update tests.yml: add scheduled workflow by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/65
* Update release.yml: fix version regex by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/66
* fix: avoid bash injection in github actions by using `env` by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/67
* use latest ubuntu where version is not important by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/68
* fix: take `conlyopts` into consideration by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/69


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.5.3...0.5.4

* fix: allow bazel steward to modify branch names, to avoid conflicts by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/47
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.7.0 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/49
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.7.0 by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/50
* fix: branch name created by bazel steward by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/51
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.7.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/53
* Updated bazel_skylib to 1.7.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/52
* chore(deps): bump VirtusLab/bazel-steward from 1.5.0 to 1.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/54
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 7.1.2 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/55
* Updated buildifier_prebuilt to 7.3.1 by @bazel-steward-app in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/56
* Update bazelisk to 1.20.0 by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/58


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.5.2...0.5.3

## What's Changed
* Small improvements by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/30
* feat: Partial Windows support by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/31
* fix: update check_each_message.bash by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/32

* refactor: summarize common bash script implementations by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/25
* update readme by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/26
* fix incorrect comment by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/27
* ci: Always explicitly specify Bazel version on CI by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/28
* Refactor: Separate non-language-specific implementations by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/29

* feat: add a badge for release by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/20
* refactor: use `sh_binary` to express an executable by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/21
* feat: Improve error message by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/22
* feat: Mac OS support by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/23

## What's Changed
* Fix obvious bugs by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/16
* test: Add tests for various OSes and Bazel versions by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/17
* release preparation by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/18
* fix: bug in release_prep.sh by @yuyawk in https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/pull/19


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/yuyawk/rules_build_error/compare/0.2.0...0.3.0
publish to BCR using https://github.com/bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr/tree/main
Miscellaneous minor changes

- Introduce C/C++ build error implementations (`cc_build_error`, `CcBuildErrorInfo`)
- Introduce `matcher` and its member functions (`matcher.contains_basic_regex`, `matcher.contains_extended_regex`, `matcher.has_substr`)
